data.message: ..... Hi ... I have been on FB sence it started .... got my sister set up on FB a year or so ago, and now she has been hacked. I have been trying for 3 days to close her hacked account down with no help from FB at all.  Its asking me to talk to 3 people to get them to send a code .... WE DON'T HAVE 3 FRIENDS THAT WILL DO THAT!!!   Why is it so hard for all the FB BILLIONAIRES to hire a crew to help the people who made them so rich???  All I want to do is DELETE A HACKED ACCOUNT that is sending out more hacking material every min. they have control of the account.  Something is just not right with this picture !!!!!!

replies.message: Hey Joe. If your sister can't get into her account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell her to go to the Hacked Accounts section at http://bit.ly/2zHk3xI to get immediate help. We can also help your sister remove her account. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2AnUY6S. -Kiara
....   I just told you  I HAVE BEEN TRYING FOR 3 DAYS !!!!!!
WHILE THESE HACKERS ARE SENDING OUT THOUSANDS OF HACKING MESSAGES EVERY MIN.!!!!!!!!!!
WHEN IT COMES TO CUSTOMER SERVICE FROM FB ... NOT ONLY DOES IT SUCK ..... THERE ISN'T ANY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
.... Just as I figured ..... NO HELP AT ALL !!!!!!
